<Protests against Donald Trump
1:
--------------------
Text: Protests against Donald Trump:  Protests have expressed opposition to Trump's campaign rhetoric, his electoral win, his inauguration and various presidential actions.

Triplets:<Protests against Donald Trump
2:
--------------------
Text: Protests against Donald Trump:  Some protests have taken the form of walk-outs, business closures, petitions and, especially since Trump's inauguration, rallies, demonstrations or marches.

Triplets:<Protests
3:
--------------------
Text: Protests against Donald Trump:  While most protests have been peaceful, some protesters have destroyed property, and attacked Trump supporters.
